author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the HCAL reco pulse shape (record `HcalRecoParamsRcd`) for Run 3. After the switch to always assuming eight pulses in the pulse fit, an energy scale offset was observed in zero-pileup samples (slide 1 of [1]). With the modified reco pulse shape assumption, most of the energy scale offset is recovered (slide 3 of [1]).

[1] https://indico.cern.ch/event/945213/contributions/3974345/attachments/2086514/3505289/HCAL_AlCaDB_10_08_201.pdf

The global tag diffs are as follows:

**2021 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_design_v6/112X_mcRun3_2021_design_v7

**2021 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v6/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v7

**2021 cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v6/112X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v7

**2021 heavy ion**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v7/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v8

**2023 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v6/112X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v7

**2024 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v6/112X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v7

#### PR validation:

Please see the [presentation by the HCAL group](https://indico.cern.ch/event/945213/#28-update-and-validation-of-hc) for details of the validation. In addition, a technical test was performed:

`runTheMatrix.py -l limited,12024.0,7.23,159.0,12834.0 --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport. A test GT for the 2021 realistic scenario will be created in 11_1_X and a backport may be considered.
title: Modify HCAL reco pulse shape for Run 3
